verses.verse: And <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G816>earnestly<s%> <S%G816>beholding<s%> the <S%G4892>council,<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G435>Men<s%> and <S%G80>brothers,<s%> I have <S%G4176>lived<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> before <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>
And the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G367>Ananias<s%> <S%G2004>commanded<s%> them that <S%G3936>stood<s%> by him to <S%G5180>smite<s%> him on the <S%G4750>mouth.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> to him, <S%G2316>God<s%> shall <S%G5180>smite<s%> you, you white <S%G2867>washed<s%> <S%G5109>wall:<s%> for <S%G2521>sit<s%> you to <S%G2919>judge<s%> me <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> and <S%G2753>command<s%> me to be <S%G5180>smitten<s%> <S%G3891>contrary<s%> to the <S%G3891>law?<s%>
And they that <S%G3936>stood<s%> by <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3058>Revile<s%> you <S%G2316>God's<s%> <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest?<s%>

<S%G5037>Then<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> I <S%G1492>knew<s%> not, <S%G80>brothers,<s%> that he was the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest:<s%> for it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> You shall not <S%G2046>speak<s%> <S%G2560>evil<s%> of the <S%G758>ruler<s%> of your <S%G2992>people.<s%>

But when <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1097>perceived<s%> that the <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3313>part<s%> were <S%G4523>Sadducees,<s%> and the <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> he <S%G2896>cried<s%> out in the <S%G4892>council,<s%> <S%G435>Men<s%> and <S%G80>brothers,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> a <S%G5330>Pharisee,<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of a <S%G5330>Pharisee:<s%> of the <S%G1680>hope<s%> and <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead<s%> I am <S%G2919>called<s%> in <S%G2919>question.<s%>

And when he had <S%G5124>so<s%> <S%G2980>said,<s%> there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G4714>dissension<s%> between the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and the <S%G4523>Sadducees:<s%> and the <S%G4128>multitude<s%> was <S%G4977>divided.<s%>

For the <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> that there is <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G386>resurrection,<s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> <S%G32>angel,<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G4151>spirit:<s%> but the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3670>confess<s%> <S%G297>both.<s%>

And there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2906>cry:<s%> and the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> that were of the <S%G5330>Pharisees'<s%> <S%G3313>part<s%> <S%G450>arose,<s%> and <S%G1264>strove,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> We <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> in <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G444>man:<s%> but <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> has <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to him, let us not <S%G2313>fight<s%> against <S%G2313>God.<s%>

And when there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4714>dissension,<s%> the <S%G5506>chief<s%> <S%G5506>captain,<s%> <S%G2125>fearing<s%> <S%G3361>lest<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> should have been <S%G1288>pulled<s%> in <S%G1288>pieces<s%> of them, <S%G2753>commanded<s%> the <S%G4753>soldiers<s%> to <S%G2597>go<s%> <S%G2597>down,<s%> and to <S%G726>take<s%> him by <S%G726>force<s%> from <S%G3319>among<s%> them, and to <S%G71>bring<s%> him <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3925>castle.<s%>

And the <S%G3571>night<s%> following the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2186>stood<s%> by him, and <S%G2036>said,<s%> Be of good <S%G2293>cheer,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul:<s%> for as you have <S%G1263>testified<s%> of me in <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> you <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> Rome. <S%G4516><s%>

And when it was <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4160>banded<s%> <S%G4963><s%> <S%G4963>together,<s%> and <S%G332>bound<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G332>under<s%> a <S%G332>curse,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> that they would <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G5315>eat<s%> nor <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> they had <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G3972>Paul.<s%>
And they were <S%G4119>more<s%> than <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> had <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G4945>conspiracy.<s%>

And they <S%G4334>came<s%> to the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and <S%G4245>elders,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> We have <S%G332>bound<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> <S%G332>under<s%> a great <S%G332>curse,<s%> that we will <S%G1089>eat<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> we have <S%G615>slain<s%> <S%G3972>Paul.<s%>

<S%G3568>Now<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> you with the <S%G4892>council<s%> <S%G1718>signify<s%> to the <S%G5506>chief<s%> <S%G5506>captain<s%> that he <S%G2609>bring<s%> him <S%G2609>down<s%> to you to <S%G839>morrow,<s%> as though you <S%G3195>would<s%> <S%G1231>inquire<s%> something <S%G197>more<s%> <S%G197>perfectly<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> him: and we, <S%G4253>or<s%> <S%G4253>ever<s%> he <S%G1448>come<s%> <S%G1448>near,<s%> are <S%G2092>ready<s%> to <S%G337>kill<s%> him.

And when <S%G3972>Paul's<s%> <S%G79>sister's<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of their lying in <S%G1747>wait,<s%> he <S%G3854>went<s%> and <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3925>castle,<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> <S%G3972>Paul.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G1543>centurions<s%> to him, and <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G520>Bring<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G3494>young<s%> <S%G3494>man<s%> to the <S%G5506>chief<s%> <S%G5506>captain:<s%> for he <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> thing to <S%G518>tell<s%> him.

<S%G3767>So<s%> he <S%G3880>took<s%> him, and <S%G71>brought<s%> him to the <S%G5506>chief<s%> <S%G5506>captain,<s%> and <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> the <S%G1198>prisoner<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> me to him, and <S%G2065>prayed<s%> me to <S%G71>bring<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G3494>young<s%> <S%G3494>man<s%> to you, who <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G5100>something<s%> to <S%G2980>say<s%> to you.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> the <S%G5506>chief<s%> <S%G5506>captain<s%> <S%G1949>took<s%> him by the <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and <S%G402>went<s%> with him <S%G402>aside<s%> <S%G2596>privately,<s%> <S%G2398><s%> and <S%G2065>asked<s%> him, <S%G5101>What<s%> is that you <S%G2192>have<s%> to <S%G518>tell<s%> me?

And he <S%G2036>said,<s%> The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> have <S%G4934>agreed<s%> to <S%G2065>desire<s%> you that you would <S%G2609>bring<s%> <S%G2609>down<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> to <S%G839>morrow<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4892>council,<s%> as though they <S%G3195>would<s%> <S%G4441>inquire<s%> <S%G5100>somewhat<s%> of him <S%G197>more<s%> <S%G197>perfectly.<s%>

But do not you <S%G3982>yield<s%> to them: for there lie in <S%G1748>wait<s%> for him of them <S%G4119>more<s%> than <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G435>men,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> have <S%G332>bound<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> with an <S%G332>oath,<s%> that they will <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G5315>eat<s%> nor <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> they have <S%G337>killed<s%> him: and <S%G3568>now<s%> are they <S%G2092>ready,<s%> <S%G4327>looking<s%> for a <S%G1860>promise<s%> from you.

<S%G3767>So<s%> the <S%G5506>chief<s%> <S%G5506>captain<s%> then <S%G630>let<s%> the <S%G3494>young<s%> <S%G3494>man<s%> <S%G630>depart,<s%> and <S%G3853>charged<s%> him, See you <S%G1583>tell<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>man<s%> that you have <S%G1718>showed<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things to me.

And he <S%G4341>called<s%> to him <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G1543>centurions,<s%> <S%G2036>saying,<s%> <S%G2090>Make<s%> <S%G2090>ready<s%> <S%G1250>two<s%> <S%G1250>hundred<s%> <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> to <S%G4198>go<s%> to <S%G2542>Caesarea,<s%> and <S%G2460>horsemen<s%> three <S%G1440>score<s%> and ten, and <S%G1187>spearmen<s%> <S%G1250>two<s%> <S%G1250>hundred,<s%> <S%G575>at<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> of the <S%G3571>night;<s%>

And <S%G3936>provide<s%> them <S%G2934>beasts,<s%> that they may <S%G1913>set<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1913>on,<s%> and <S%G1295>bring<s%> him <S%G1295>safe<s%> to <S%G5344>Felix<s%> the <S%G2232>governor.<s%>
And he <S%G1125>wrote<s%> a <S%G1992>letter<s%> <S%G4023>after<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G5179>manner:<s%>
<S%G2804>Claudius<s%> <S%G3079>Lysias<s%> to the <S%G2903>most<s%> <S%G2903>excellent<s%> <S%G2232>governor<s%> <S%G5344>Felix<s%> sends <S%G5463>greeting.<s%>

<S%G5126>This<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> was <S%G4815>taken<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> and <S%G3195>should<s%> have been <S%G615>killed<s%> of them: then <S%G2186>came<s%> I with an <S%G4753>army,<s%> and <S%G1807>rescued<s%> him, having <S%G3129>understood<s%> that he was a <S%G4514>Roman.<s%>

And when I would have <S%G1097>known<s%> the <S%G156>cause<s%> <S%G1223>why<s%> <S%G3739><s%> they <S%G1458>accused<s%> him, I <S%G2609>brought<s%> him <S%G2609>forth<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> their <S%G4892>council:<s%>

<S%G3739>Whom<s%> I <S%G2147>perceived<s%> to be <S%G1458>accused<s%> of <S%G2213>questions<s%> of their <S%G3551>law,<s%> but to <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G1462>laid<s%> to his <S%G1462>charge<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G336>death<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G1199>bonds.<s%>

And when it was <S%G3377>told<s%> me how that the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2071>laid<s%> <S%G1917>wait<s%> for the <S%G435>man,<s%> I <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G1824>straightway<s%> to you, and gave <S%G3853>commandment<s%> to his <S%G2725>accusers<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> you <S%G3588>what<s%> they had <S%G4314>against<s%> him. <S%G4517>Farewell.<s%>
<S%G3767>Then<s%> the <S%G4757>soldiers,<s%> as it was <S%G1299>commanded<s%> them, <S%G353>took<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> and <S%G71>brought<s%> him by <S%G3571>night<s%> to <S%G494>Antipatris.<s%>
On the <S%G1887>morrow<s%> they <S%G1439>left<s%> the <S%G2460>horsemen<s%> to <S%G4198>go<s%> with him, and <S%G5290>returned<s%> to the <S%G3925>castle:<s%>

<S%G3748>Who,<s%> when they <S%G1525>came<s%> to Caesarea <S%G2542><s%>and <S%G325>delivered<s%> the <S%G1992>letter<s%> to the <S%G2232>governor,<s%> <S%G3936>presented<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> before him.

And when the <S%G2232>governor<s%> had <S%G314>read<s%> the letter, he <S%G1905>asked<s%> of <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G1885>province<s%> he was. And when he <S%G4441>understood<s%> that he was of <S%G2791>Cilicia;<s%>

I will <S%G1251>hear<s%> you, <S%G5346>said<s%> he, <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2725>accusers<s%> are <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3854>come.<s%> And he <S%G2753>commanded<s%> him to be <S%G5442>kept<s%> in <S%G2264>Herod's<s%> <S%G4232>judgment<s%> <S%G4232>hall.<s%>
